data.comment: The match is underway in Curitiba.
Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Paranaense.
In the minute 3, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 8, Can Paranaense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 9, Lucho Gonzalez is booked for the home team.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
At Arena da Baixada, Paranaense are penalized for being offside.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 25, Important block from the Paranaense defence as Matheus Babi fires in a strike for Botafogo.
Maycon Nikao for Paranaense drives towards goal at Arena da Baixada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Paranaense.
Paranaense needs to be cautious. Botafogo have an attacking throw-in.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In the minute 27, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the home team a throw-in.
Botafogo drives forward and Kevin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Paranaense are coming forward and Leo Cittadini gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 28, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Botafogo.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 34, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick Paranaense.
Paranaense attack but Felipe Aguilar's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 42, Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Caio Alexandre, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 44, Paranaense's Bissoli gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
Botafogo's Caio Alexandre is back in action after a slight knock.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
The first-half has ended.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Jonathan is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in Botafogo.
In the minute 50, Paranaense's Jonathan looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 51, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense push forward at Arena da Baixada and Marcio Azevedo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Botafogo defence.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 54, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the away team a throw-in.
Botafogo drive upfield and Caio Alexandre gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Paranaense defender.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Botafogo throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 56, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense's Leo Cittadini breaks free at Arena da Baixada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 59, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Paranaense make their second substitution with Jaime Alvarado replacing Lucho Gonzalez.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Botafogo at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Eduardo Maciel de Barros (Paranaense) is making a first substitution, with Christian replacing Leo Cittadini.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Carlos Renteria is replacing Luiz Otavio for Botafogo at Arena da Baixada.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
The away team replace Salomon Kalou with Rhuan.
In the minute 64, Free kick Paranaense.
Bissoli (Paranaense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 69, Erick for Paranaense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Khellven is replacing Jonathan for the home team.
Botafogo are pushing forward but Caio Alexandre's finish is wide of the goal.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Eduardo Maciel de Barros is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena da Baixada with Geuvanio replacing Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva.
In the minute 71, Paranaense are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Arena da Baixada.
Botafogo's Bruno Nazario gets in a shot on goal at Arena da Baixada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Curitiba.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In the minute 76, Botafogo to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Botafogo have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Victor Luis.
In the minute 81, The home team have replaced Erick with Ravanelli. This is the fifth substitution made today by Eduardo Maciel de Barros.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
In Curitiba, Thiago Heleno (Paranaense) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Botafogo.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a throw-in for Botafogo, close to Paranaense's area.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Ravanelli gets an equalizer for Paranaense. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 88, Geuvanio with an assist there.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Paranaense.
Paranaense were awarded a penalty ... Which Maycon Nikao failed to convert!
Paranaense's Maycon Nikao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Geuvanio (Paranaense) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
